channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cillian Murphy's Lookalike Son Aran, 17, Follows in Dad's Footsteps as He's Cast in Upcoming HBO Series
item.description: The teenager has joined the cast of 'WAR,' a new series that's led by Dominic West and Sienna Miller

item.title: Jessie J Says She's ‘Frustrated' That Her Second Breast Cancer Surgery Was Postponed
item.description: “It's out of my control,” the singer said, adding that she had already canceled her tour dates for the procedure

item.title: Sydney Sweeney Recalls Being Told to 'Fix' Her Face with Botox When She Was 16. Now, She Wants to 'Age Gracefully'
item.description: The actress opened up about the hardships of auditions when she started out in the industry in a new interview with 'Variety'

item.title: Lily Allen and David Harbour List N.Y.C. Townhouse with a Room for Arguing for $8M amid Cheating Allegations
item.description: In a 2023 video tour of the home, the ‘Stranger Things’ star played out a scene where an unexpected ex turned up at the couple's door

item.title: Kate Gosselin Says Her Kids 'Always Worried' About Her Being Alone, Are 'So Happy' Over Her New Relationship
item.description: The mom of 8 confirmed she's dating someone new in a TikTok video in September
